description:
net: make some tests less flaky

Fixes issue 4969

messages.text:
phew, thanks.
did i make a crosstalk situation by deadlines?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

given that I couldn't make test TestTCPConnSpecificMethods pass
on the netbsd/arm builder (see http://build.golang.org/log/67d1c8aec152c5d1c23923fba2aa8f254ff3f83b),
could you please do the same to ~line 108 of protoconn_test.go?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, minux.ma@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On Mon, Mar 4, 2013 at 10:28 AM, <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> given that I couldn't make test TestTCPConnSpecificMethods pass
> on the netbsd/arm builder (see
> http://build.golang.org/log/**67d1c8aec152c5d1c23923fba2aa8f**254ff3f83b<http://build.golang.org/log/67d1c8aec152c5d1c23923fba2aa8f254ff3f83b>
> ),
> could you please do the same to ~line 108 of protoconn_test.go?
>

done

LGTM.

Please make the description more general, perhaps
just "net: make non-timeout tests less flaky".

On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 3:14 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> On Mon, Mar 4, 2013 at 10:28 AM, <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
>> given that I couldn't make test TestTCPConnSpecificMethods pass
>> on the netbsd/arm builder (see
>> http://build.golang.org/log/67d1c8aec152c5d1c23923fba2aa8f254ff3f83b),
>> could you please do the same to ~line 108 of protoconn_test.go?
> done
Thank you!

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e39b9fa789ca ***

net: make some tests less flaky

Fixes issue 4969

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7456049

On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 7:48 AM,  <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:
> phew, thanks.
> did i make a crosstalk situation by deadlines?
no, it's just some builders are really slow.

subject: code review 7456049: net: make TestConnAndListener less flaky
